statements: DELETE FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Events WHERE event_location LIKE '%City%'
DELETE FROM academic_calendars WHERE academic_year = 2022 AND start_date < '2022-09-01';
DELETE FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-09-01' AND event_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM calendars WHERE calendar_year < 2021 AND calendar_type = 'Public';
DELETE FROM academic_calendars WHERE academic_year > 2021 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM event_calendar_mapping WHERE event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM events WHERE location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM calendars WHERE calendar_id IN (SELECT calendar_id FROM event_calendars WHERE event_id = 1);
